# NEFilterAction.remediate

**Case**

Remediate the flow.

## Declaration

```swift
case remediate
```

## Discussion

This action results in a “content blocked” page being displayed to the user.

## Enumeration Cases

- **NEFilterAction.invalid**: Invalid action used to represent an error.
- **NEFilterAction.allow**: Allow the flow.
- **NEFilterAction.drop**: Drop the flow.
- **NEFilterAction.filterData**: Filter data on the flow.

items.description: Invalid action used to represent an error.
